createapp.name: CreateApp
createapp.description: Grants permission to create a new Amplify App

createbackendenvironment.name: CreateBackendEnvironment
createbackendenvironment.description: Grants permission to create a new backend environment for an Amplify App

createbranch.name: CreateBranch
createbranch.description: Grants permission to create a new Branch for an Amplify App

createdeployment.name: CreateDeployment
createdeployment.description: Grants permission to create a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

createdomainassociation.name: CreateDomainAssociation
createdomainassociation.description: Grants permission to create a new DomainAssociation on an App

createwebhook.name: CreateWebHook
createwebhook.description: Grants permission to create a new webhook on an App

deleteapp.name: DeleteApp
deleteapp.description: Grants permission to delete an existing Amplify App by appId

deletebackendenvironment.name: DeleteBackendEnvironment
deletebackendenvironment.description: Grants permission to delete a branch for an Amplify App

deletebranch.name: DeleteBranch
deletebranch.description: Grants permission to delete a branch for an Amplify App

deletedomainassociation.name: DeleteDomainAssociation
deletedomainassociation.description: Grants permission to delete a DomainAssociation

deletejob.name: DeleteJob
deletejob.description: Grants permission to delete a job, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App

deletewebhook.name: DeleteWebHook
deletewebhook.description: Grants permission to delete a webhook by id

generateaccesslogs.name: GenerateAccessLogs
generateaccesslogs.description: Grants permission to generate website access logs for a specific time range via a pre-signed URL

getapp.name: GetApp
getapp.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing Amplify App by appId

getartifacturl.name: GetArtifactUrl
getartifacturl.description: Grants permission to retrieve artifact info that corresponds to a artifactId

getbackendenvironment.name: GetBackendEnvironment
getbackendenvironment.description: Grants permission to retrieve a backend environment for an Amplify App

getbranch.name: GetBranch
getbranch.description: Grants permission to retrieve a branch for an Amplify App

getdomainassociation.name: GetDomainAssociation
getdomainassociation.description: Grants permission to retrieve domain info that corresponds to an appId and domainName

getjob.name: GetJob
getjob.description: Grants permission to get a job for a branch, part of an Amplify App

getwebhook.name: GetWebHook
getwebhook.description: Grants permission to retrieve webhook info that corresponds to a webhookId

listapps.name: ListApps
listapps.description: Grants permission to list existing Amplify Apps

listartifacts.name: ListArtifacts
listartifacts.description: Grants permission to list artifacts with an app, a branch, a job and an artifact type

listbackendenvironments.name: ListBackendEnvironments
listbackendenvironments.description: Grants permission to list backend environments for an Amplify App

listbranches.name: ListBranches
listbranches.description: Grants permission to list branches for an Amplify App

listdomainassociations.name: ListDomainAssociations
listdomainassociations.description: Grants permission to list domains with an app

listjobs.name: ListJobs
listjobs.description: Grants permission to list Jobs for a branch, part of an Amplify App

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an AWS Amplify Console resource

listwebhooks.name: ListWebHooks
listwebhooks.description: Grants permission to list webhooks on an App

startdeployment.name: StartDeployment
startdeployment.description: Grants permission to start a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

startjob.name: StartJob
startjob.description: Grants permission to start a new job for a branch, part of an Amplify App

stopjob.name: StopJob
stopjob.description: Grants permission to stop a job that is in progress, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag an AWS Amplify Console resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an AWS Amplify Console resource

updateapp.name: UpdateApp
updateapp.description: Grants permission to update an existing Amplify App

updatebranch.name: UpdateBranch
updatebranch.description: Grants permission to update a branch for an Amplify App

updatedomainassociation.name: UpdateDomainAssociation
updatedomainassociation.description: Grants permission to update a DomainAssociation on an App

updatewebhook.name: UpdateWebHook
updatewebhook.description: Grants permission to update a webhook
